name: Greenyard NV
goal:
Greenyard (Euronext Brussels: GREEN) is a global market leader in fresh and prepared fruit & vegetables. Greenyard has operations worldwide and serves a global customer base including most of the leading retailers in Europe.
The Group counts more than 8,000 employees active in 25 countries worldwide, with a turnover of 3.9 billion EUR in the fiscal year ending on 31 March 2019.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Common Agricultural Policy
Unfair trading practices in the food chain
EU Trade Policy
